# SampleConfs - Items & Equipment

Config files related to items, equipment, artifacts, and inventory systems.

## Artifacts - Shape & Crafting
- **ArtifactShape.json**
- **ArtifactShapeCommon.json**
- **ArtifactShapeFire.json**
- **ArtifactShapeMaterial.json**
- **ArtifactShapeMixed.json**
- **ArtifactShapeRefine.json**
- **ArtifactShapeRepair.json**
- **ArtifactShapeRepairSub.json**
- **ArtifactShapeUpgrade.json**

## Artifacts - Sprites & Effects
- **ArtifactSprite.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteArt.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteClose.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteDialogue.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteDialogueSub.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteEquip.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteLevel.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteSkill.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteStroy.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteTalent.json**
- **ArtifactSpriteTalentCost.json**

## Clothing & Appearance
- **ClothChange.json**
- **ClothItem.json**
- **ClothShopBase.json**

## Item Types
- **ItemBook.json** - Books and scrolls
- **ItemChest.json** - Treasure chests
- **ItemChestDrops.json** - Chest loot tables
- **ItemFate.json** - Fate items
- **ItemFunction.json** - Functional items
- **ItemGloom.json** - Dark/cursed items
- **ItemHerbal.json** - Herbs and plants
- **ItemHobby.json** - Hobby items
- **ItemHorse.json** - Mount items
- **ItemImmortalPoint.json** - Immortal points
- **ItemLotusSeed.json** - Lotus seeds
- **ItemMapSearch.json** - Map search items
- **ItemPill.json** - Pills and elixirs
- **ItemPillSpRequire.json** - Pill requirements
- **ItemProps.json** - General props
- **ItemRarityMaterials.json** - Rare materials
- **ItemSchoolRelocateFlag.json** - School relocation items
- **ItemSkill.json** - Skill items
- **ItemSoulDevourSword.json** - Soul Devour Sword
- **ItemTerrain.json** - Terrain items
- **ItemTransfer.json** - Transfer items
- **ItemTreasureMap.json** - Treasure maps
- **ItemType.json** - Item type definitions

## Item Systems
- **ItemLevelDesc.json** - Item level descriptions

## Rings & Accessories
- **RingBase.json** - Ring base stats
